name: Fantastic STIs 2022 From 18 To 81
description:
GAME TITLE: Fantastic STIs 2022 From 18 To 81

Use 🅐 🅢 🅓 🅦 on your keyboard to control the chaotic messy character that's you.

To win: Enjoy the pleasure =) of ❤️/🍑/🍆, while keeping yourself free from 🐛STIs.

To lose: Become too lonely or too infected.

REFRESH the browser to restart.

PrEP: pre-exposure prophylaxis

PEP: post-exposure prophylaxis

☔: condom 💬: have conversations 🧪: get tested

💉: vaccine/antibiotic 💊: antibiotics

💊💊💊💊💊💊💊: Daily HIV Antiretroviral Drugs (ART)

🪔+🏊: HIV/AIDS organizations/people
